response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 12000}
